name: Villainous - Board Game Template (To Print)
description:
INTRODUCTION

I created this template for 2 players as a gift to a friend. It is a VERSION TO PRINT, you will need A4 and A3 paper, recommended a bit thicker for the cards and Player Board to be more resistant.


PLAYERS

Player 1 follows the gameplay of Captain Hook.

Player 2 follows the gameplay of Malefficent.


MODIFICATIONS

You can update all the images and texts to make the gameplay work better for your story.

For now all the texts are in French, but I will update them into English (coming soon).
